price: ߞߋߟߊ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߸ ߒ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߓߘߊ߫ ߘߐ߬ߛߊߙߌ ߣߌ߲߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊߕߏߕߊ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-rasūlu yārabbi inna qawmī ittakhadhū hādhā al-qur'āna mahjūran
